=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Last Starfighter
Review Date: 2018/09/18
Store: Lance Guest  (Actor),     Catherine Mary Stewart  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Comedy
Product Description: ['“Greetings, Starfighter! You have been recruited by the Star League to defend the frontier against Xur and the Kodan Armada.” So begins an adventure of galactic proportions in The Last Starfighter. After Earthling Alex (Lance Guest) conquers the Starfighter video game, he is recruited by alien Centauri (Robert Preston) to be part of an elite legion of fighters. Leaving behind his trailer park home for the outer regions of space, Alex becomes the last hope for the beleaguered Star League and hundreds of worlds – including Earth. Loaded with out-of-this-world bonus features and digitally remastered for optimum picture quality, The Last Starfighter 25th Anniversary Edition is the ultimate video game fantasy come true!']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '5457968', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Original recording remastered, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 18, 2009', 'Actors': 'Lance Guest, Catherine Mary Stewart, Ed Berke, Al Berry, Ellen Blake', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified, French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}

Review Title: my 40 year old daughters favorite growing up movie
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Flight of the Navigator
Review Date: 2018/09/18
Store: Joey Cramer  (Actor),     Veronica Cartwright  (Actor),     Randal Kleiser  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Fantasy
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'David Freeman (Joey Cramer) is an ordinary boy destined for a most extraordinary adventure -- aboard a spectacular, futuristic spacecraft. After a mystifying disappearance, David returns, possessing vast, undiscovered knowledge about the farthest reaches of the universe. With these sudden navigational powers, David is able to take the fantastic flying machine anywhere he desires, accompanied by both its wisecracking robotic commander, Max, and an assortment of bizarre extraterrestrial creatures! Embark on a fun-filled, fast-paced journey of fantasy and adventure as David takes off on the flight of a lifetime! Also featuring Sarah Jessica Parker and the voice of Paul Reubens.|The movie was filmed in Broward County, Florida, and, at the other extreme, Norway.|Sarah Jessica Parker makes one of her first film appearances in this 1986 flick.|Paul Reubens (Pee-wee Herman) stars as the voice of Max, a wisecracking robotic spaceship commander.', 'Amazon.com', "Disney's 1986", 'Flight of the Navigator', "combines a strong ensemble cast and classic '80s soundtrack with dazzling special effects for a high-flying sci-fi adventure. While searching for his little brother in the woods, 12-year-old David Freeman (Joey Cramer) falls down a ravine and is knocked unconscious. After what seems like minutes, he returns home, only to discover that eight years have passed since he was declared missing and presumed dead. Even more mystifying is that David hasn't aged, nor can he account for the time lapse. Meanwhile, NASA officials stumble upon a futuristic spacecraft and are determined to assess what David knows about it by locking him in a top-secret lab for scanning and testing. His only chance of escape is in the spacecraft manned by Max, a wisecracking robot. Cramer gives an earnest performance, which overcomes an imperfect script, while enough one-liners and imaginative animation will keep families engaged. Watch for Sarah Jessica Parker in one of her first film appearances. Rated PG for language. (Ages 6 and older)", '--Lynn Gibson']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'ACTION, Action/Adventure, LIVE', 'Format': 'Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Surround Sound, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Richard Liberty, Sarah Jessica Parker, Brigid Cleary, Michael Burton, Cliff De Young, Paul Reubens, Veronica Cartwright, Ted Bartsch, Michael Strano, Cynthia Caquelin, Raymond Forchion, Gizelle Elliot, Robert Small, Matt Adler, Jonathan Sanger, Matt MacManus, Howard Hesseman, Albie Whitaker, Iris Acker, Randal Kleiser, Joey CramerRichard Liberty, Sarah Jessica Parker, Brigid Cleary, Michael Burton, Cliff De Young, Paul Reubens, Veronica Cartwright, Ted Bartsch, Michael Strano, Cynthia Caquelin, Raymond Forchion, Gizelle Elliot, Robert Small, Matt Adler, Jonathan Sanger, Matt MacManus, Howar…  See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Surround)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.5 x 7.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2259724', 'Director': 'Randal Kleiser', 'Media Format': 'Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Surround Sound, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 1, 2004', 'Actors': 'Joey Cramer, Veronica Cartwright, Cliff De Young, Sarah Jessica Parker, Matt Adler', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'WALT DISNEY PICTURES', 'Writers': 'Michael Burton, Matt MacManus', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: gift for my adult daughter
Review Title: gift
Rating: 5.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Neverending Story (30th Anniversary Edition) [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2018/09/18
Store: Alan Oppenheimer  (Actor),     Jeff Burr  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['The Neverending Story 30th Anniversary (BD)', "When young Bastian borrows a mysterious, ornately-bound book, he never dreamed turning a page would draw him into a shimmering fantasy world of racing snails, hang-glider bats, soaring luckdragons, puckish elves, a Childlike Empress, the brave warrior Atreyu and a slab-faced walking quarry called a Rock Biter. Follow The NeverEnding Story to the limits of the imagination, thanks to director/co-writer Wolfgang Petersen (The Perfect Storm) and a superstar team of technical tinkerers and magicians (with credits including 2001: A Space Odyssey, Alien and The Empire Strikes Back) who bring to life the most delightful characters ever. You'll cherish this wide-eyed adventure and discover The NeverEnding Story is your story.", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Fantasy, Science Fiction', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Dieter Geissler, Bernd Eichinger, Howard Albrecht, John Hyde, Tami Stronach, Moses Gunn, Mark Damon, Wolfgang Petersen, Jeff Burr, Patricia Hayes, Gerald McRaney, Herman Weigel, Alan Oppenheimer, Sydney BromleyDieter Geissler, Bernd Eichinger, Howard Albrecht, John Hyde, Tami Stronach, Moses Gunn, Mark Damon, Wolfgang Petersen, Jeff Burr, Patricia Hayes, Gerald McRaney, Herman Weigel, Alan Oppenheimer, Sydney Bromley  See more', 'Initial release date': '2014-10-07', 'Language': 'English', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000489470BR', 'Director': 'Wolfgang Petersen', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 7, 2014', 'Actors': 'Alan Oppenheimer, Jeff Burr, Howard Albrecht, Tami Stronach, Moses Gunn', 'Producers': 'Bernd Eichinger, Mark Damon, Dieter Geissler, John Hyde', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Writers': 'Wolfgang Petersen, Herman Weigel', 'Number of discs': '1'}

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards nostalgic family-oriented and science fiction content, particularly from the 1980s. Consistently high ratings for fantasy and sci-fi films underline a preference for engaging storytelling and imaginative themes. The person demonstrates a mixed sentiment towards fitness-related products, reflecting a desire for home workout options but expressing dissatisfaction regarding expectations versus reality.

The recurring nature of gifting indicates a consideration for family, likely purchasing for adult daughters, suggesting an emotional connection to the products that resonate with shared experiences. In terms of quality, the higher ratings signify a preference for well-produced content, while a price sensitivity pattern is implied by the lack of premium products in the purchase history. This suggests a practical approach to spending, favoring value for money without venturing into expensive options.

Overall, the core preferences encapsulate a blend of nostalgia, family engagement, and a focus on value while maintaining high expectations for quality.

target_interaction.title: old used scratched full of sticky finger prints
target_interaction.text: didn't open for a few days ... husband opened it set it on TV cabinet , last night 7/3/22 I wanted to watch it  then I noticed the wrapper opened it saw the Damage  the box has abrasions the dvd had many sticky finger prints and scratches that made it unusable box gone receipt gone
description: The world is a confusing place for Wendy, a fiercely independent and brilliant young woman with autism. Wendy longs to leave her group home and return to life with her sister’s family and new baby. She is sure that in order to reunite with her family all she needs to do is convince them of her newfound competence and abilities. As a lover of all things Star Trek, Wendy writes in her free time; so when she hears about a Star Trek screenplay competition, she seizes the opportunity to submit her 500 page script and prove her worth. The only problem: if she doesn’t hand it in in person she will miss the deadline! Wendy sneaks out of her group home and travels hundreds of miles outside her protected boundaries and refuses to let anything stop her from achieving her goals.
